title: One Piece: Yume no Soccer Ou!
synopsis: Luffy and his crew take on the Villain All-Stars in a game of soccer in order to become the Dream Soccer King. The game comes down to a pk tie-breaker shoot-out with Coby as goalie and Helmeppo refereeing.
related_anime: ['One Piece Movie 3: Chinjuu-jima no Chopper Oukoku', 'One Piece']
characters: ['Monkey D., Luffy', 'Roronoa, Zoro', 'Sanji', 'Tony Tony, Chopper', 'Usopp', 'Nami', 'Bentham', 'Buggy', 'Nefertari, Vivi', 'Carue']
voices: ['Tanaka, Mayumi', 'Nakai, Kazuya', 'Hirata, Hiroaki', 'Ootani, Ikue', 'Yamaguchi, Kappei', 'Okamura, Akemi', 'Yao, Kazuki', 'Chiba, Shigeru', 'Watanabe, Misa']
